arrow.name: Arrow
arrow.description: display arrow at end of input. available if `variant` is `input`.

error_message.name: Error Message
error_message.description: error message for input.message informing user of invalid input.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: feather icon name to place on left-hand side of input. you can use any feather icon name in this field, but the most common have been added as options to storybook. available if `variant` is `input`.

placeholder.name: Placeholder
placeholder.description: attribute for placeholder that appears within input.

rows.name: Rows
rows.description: number of rows passed to textarea. available if `variant` is `textarea`.

success_message.name: Success Message
success_message.description: message informing user of valid input.

type.name: Type
type.description: form input type (i.e. email, password, text, etc.). available if `variant` is `input`.

value.name: Value
value.description: value of the input. useful for filling in form with previously submitted fields.

variant.name: Variant
variant.description: either input field, select, or textarea.
